aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: A business partner certifcate describes a certificate (eg ISO9001, IATF-16949) via a certifcate document of a Catena-X business partner
Type of the certificate as defined on the document like IS09001, IATF 16949 or other
Additional sites covered by the certificate, which can be either the Business Partner Number Site (BPNS) or Business Partner Number Address (BPNA)
Additional sites covered by the certificate, which can be either the Business Partner Number Site (BPNS) or Business Partner Number Address (BPNA)
The BPN of the issuing authority e.g. TUEV Sued
The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the data service provider who validates the given certificate.
The content and ID of the document.
A business partner certifcate describes a certificate (eg ISO9001, IATF-16949) via a certifcate document of a Catena-X business partner

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: A business partner certifcate describes a certificate (eg ISO9001, IATF-16949) via a certifcate document of a Catena-X business partner
The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the certified legal entity .
Type of the certificate as defined on the document,valid types are registered at BPN metadatacontroller
Version of the certificate as defined on the document, usually the specific version of a certification standard
Type of the certificate as defined on the document like IS09001, IATF 16949 or other
Registration number of the certificate as defined on the certificate
Details on which areas / application types a certificate is valid for a company and/or site.
The Business Partner Number (BPN) of an enclosed site
Additional sites covered by the certificate, which can be either the Business Partner Number Site (BPNS) or Business Partner Number Address (BPNA)
Valid from date as defined on the certificate.
Valid valid until as defined on the certificate. If certificate never expires value until expected to be 9999-12-31
Name of the Issuer i.e. Certifying Authority.
The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the Issuer.
The BPN of the issuing authority e.g. TUEV Sued
The trust level of the given certificate - none,low, high, trusted
The optional name of the data service provider who validated the given certificate
The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the data service provider who validated the given certificate
The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the data service provider who validates the given certificate.
The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the business partner who originally provided the certifcate data or document.
The creation date of the document.
The id of the certificate document as stored by the data service provider.
The content type of the document.
The data is encoded using the Base64 encoding scheme, which converts binary data into a string of ASCII characters.
The content and ID of the document.
